name: Heroku Liveagent Bot Endpoint
description: This app serves as an endpoint for integrating our Alexa and Dialogflow bots, as well as middleware for Twilio and Facebook.

APIAI_AUTH_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of Dialogflow / API.AI calls.

APIAI_CLIENT_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The Client Access Token generated by Dialoglow / API.AI

APIAI_REQUIRE_AUTH.description: Boolean to determine if API.AI calls require Authentication

FB_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Token used when registering endpoint with Facebook. Value can be anything

FB_PAGE_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Page access token, generated by Facebook

LIVE_AGENT_URL.description: URL for Live Agent. Found under setup --> Live Agent --> Settings

SF_CLIENT_ID.description: Salesforce Client Id for connected App

SF_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Salesforce Client Secret for connected App

SF_REDIRECT_URL.description: Salesforce Redirect URL for connected app

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Twilio Account SID from Account dashbaord
